items.sentence: I found it necessary to get up early every morning.
I found the diary that my father kept for 30 years.
I got a rash on my hands from dishwasher detergent.
I guess you heard about what happened this morning.
Tom doesn\'t think that Mary looks like her mother.
Tom lied to Mary when he said he didn\'t know John.
Some of the passengers weren\'t wearing seat belts.
You need to be careful not to hurt Tom\'s feelings.
You ought to tell Tom you aren\'t planning to swim.
You really want to move back to Boston, don\'t you?
Tom\'s disappearance completely baffled the police.
Tom\'s health has been deteriorating for some time.
Tom\'s operation was going to cost a small fortune.
I haven\'t found a way to stop Tom from doing that.
Don\'t force Tom to do that if he doesn\'t want to.
Don\'t force yourself to eat if you don\'t want to.
How many hours a day does she spend in the kitchen?
Didn\'t you know Tom isn\'t planning on doing that?
Tom heard a strange sound coming from the basement.
Tom intends to live in Boston for more than a year.
